The Tsar looked intently and observantly into Kutuzov's eye waiting to hear whether he would say anything more. But Kutuzov, with respectfully bowed head, seemed also to be waiting. The silence lasted for about a min- ute. 
"However, if you command it, Your Majes- ty," said Kutiizov, lifting his head and again assuming his former tone of a dull, unreason- ing, but submissive general.
